website_summaries.verdict: The Sony 16-50mm Retractable Zoom Lens is the smallest zoom that you can get for your NEX camera, but it's far from the best.

customer_reviews.title: Better Deal
customer_reviews.text: If you are concerned with ordering this non-US warranty version compared to the same lens but packaged for the US with US warranty for $100+ more consider this... The US lens warranty is a 1 year warranty for manufacturer defects. Alternatively, you can get this same lens and add the 2 year any way it breaks protection (you drop it, dunk it, whatever) for under $20. This warranty, sold by Amazon (guaranteed by Square, I believe). Oh darn, now they offer a 3 or 4 year protection... all still for far less than the 1 year Sony warranty. Sounds like a no brainer, to me (oh, it is the same lens, works like a champ!).
customer_reviews.author: R. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: An excellent all purpose convenient lens for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well with my Nex 7, two Nex 5R and a Nex 3. I used different modes from close up at wide angle as well as on 50 mm focal length to landscapes and a few snap shots of people. Color and details were satisfactory, definitely not Leica quality mechanically and optically but this lens purpose is to provide the convenience of quick shots later displayed on computers. As for the 1 year Sony warranty, who cares at half-price? i am confident that this lens will out last a year, besides most lenses ar damaged by dropping them or other accidental events which are never covered by warranty anyway.
customer_reviews.author: john R.

customer_reviews.title: Takes State Approved Photos.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Sony a5000. It fits all my needs and then some. I can learn something about it everyday. But I am slow....it is an excellent investment. I had to replace the lens. I got 60% off of new box price. I was blessed.
customer_reviews.author: greg maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Be weary
customer_reviews.text: This item is as described. However the packaging was terrible. As a lens it is very fragile it was packaged in 1 layer of bubble Wrap and a small package. I am afraid it will stop working due to the possibility that it was thrown around on delivery
customer_reviews.author: NATALIE

customer_reviews.title: When it works, its GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a few months of use. Even one I purchased from Amazon (used model) arrived with the same broken zoom function. Must be a common problem for this lens. So its great when it works, and all I can say is be VERY gentle with it.
customer_reviews.author: K2

customer_reviews.title: These seem to break easily with relatively minor camera drops
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. This is our second replacement lens. These seem to break easily with relatively minor camera drops. Highly recommend getting the Amazon insurance coverage. Too costly to keep purchasing these as replacements otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: michael price

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough, great for travel.
customer_reviews.text: I was silly to think this was a full frame lens. I wanted a little more distortion at the lower millimeter. But all and all, works pretty good. And for the price, can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Dude man

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRICE FOR BRAND NEW LENS
customer_reviews.text: Came brand new packaged and save me $100. The lens is a real Sony one and So worth the buy!! I will definitely buy another one here if I need one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Caymen

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain.
customer_reviews.text: It's just the packaging that's different, mine came in a box wrapped in bubble wrap and the original sealed bag. This a great starter lens for Alpha cameras! Super versatile, small, and great for either photos or videos. I use it mainly as a point and shoot type of lens when I want to travel light.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Sony NEX-6 purchased retail in America
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the same lens that my Sony NEX-6 came with, and it's working great. The reason for the replacement is my original failed mechanically after two years. Yes I could take it apart, but those are some really small parts in there, and it's very difficult to get back together assuming I could fix it... I added the warranty on this one as I expect similar trouble down the line. Excellent price, shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Napynap

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and seller!
customer_reviews.text: This item is just what I was looking for as a replacement lens on one of my cameras. I originally went to Sony and Best Buy for this lens but both wanted $100 more than this one was. It was brand new and still in the package. Very pleased with this product and the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Collaboratories LLC

customer_reviews.title: Meh, but not many good alternatives
customer_reviews.text: Not very sharp and has a lot of barrel distortion and very noticeable vignetting, though the distortion and vignetting can be dealt with by photoshop. Very compact and flexible range of focal lengths is its strength. Would recommend as a starter lens.
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTLY REPLACED MY KIT LENS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Sony a5000 in 2014. I took very good care of my camera and the lens. One day for some reason my camera stopped recognizing the lens. Researched on YouTube how to fix it and even took it in to BestBuy for the Geek Squad to look at it...no luck....so I finally bought this lens three days before Christmas this year and it’s totally the same lens. I bought a “used” lens offer that said “Quality: Like New for $127.00” and it was totally worth it. I’m back and capturing this beautiful life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not the best but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I had this lens for about 3 months before it broke. It was in my bag and apparently the lens barrel had protruded outward and was misaligned while it was in my camera bag. When it performed it was ok for what it was. Didn't feel that fast and quality wise gave images that were subpar. If possible I'd recommend looking at Sony's Ziess lenses and Sigmas cheaper and more well built prime lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works just like original.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the one that came on my Sony a6000 mirrorless (I dropped it). Snapped it on and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: UTBadger

customer_reviews.title: Overall - Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I use this lens alot and like the images. Is it the best and most professional? No, but overall, it's a terrific lens.
customer_reviews.author: Leili

customer_reviews.title: What I expect from a kit lens.
customer_reviews.text: The lens is fine in a pinch, but the image quality overall is not that great and the mechanized zoom system is not my cup of tea. That said - for a kit zoom lens it gets the job done, just dont expect the best quality at the corners or any record setting sharpness.
customer_reviews.author: David Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Worse than the stock lense
customer_reviews.text: Not my cup of tea. You can find better lenses that are more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and lens looks like new and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and lens looks like new and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lens!
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous for the price! And stupid lightweight too. Pictures and video look nice and sharp, especially wide open at 16mm
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Shore

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the kit lens for the A6000, I found it convenient and sharp enough for my street photographyTogether with the camera house it is a very portable combo I can have nearly always with me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never worked.
customer_reviews.text: Lens does not extend when camera is turned on as it should. There is also an error message on the screen that says : Cannot recognize lens. Attach it properly. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PearFleur

customer_reviews.title: Good lens for general use on Alpha cameras
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a badly damages original lens and works fine in this use. The small size of this lens and the zoom range are very useful when wanting to have a small size but some zoom range.
customer_reviews.author: John Fountain

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I broke my old lens and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I broke my old lens and this just came on time... I prefer to use amazon products, save money guarantee and products are great. Update, there is no accessories on this piece as you can see on picture, just lens I was expecting that. Kind of disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rommel

customer_reviews.title: good lens with NEX 5r
customer_reviews.text: The pancake is a portable casual option for the Sony NEX line. It takes sharp imagines and has performed well with whatever I throw it at. The wide angle distortion makes taking close-up pictures of people kind of weird if you don't know what you're doing, but for all else it's a good choice for auto features and compactness.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: There is known problem with this lens. The A6300 ...
customer_reviews.text: There is known problem with this lens. The A6300 will not recognize it. Check out the issue on-line. Do not buy it. In 6 months my A6300 did not recognize the lens despite no damage to connectors on lens or camera.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Great little lens
customer_reviews.text: Great little lens. I use it on my NEX-6 as a walk around camera. Takes up very little room. I was concerned with reviews that this lens was "soft" on the edges, but I haven't found that to be the case. I don't use it for landscapes or large pano's so it does a fine job for me.
customer_reviews.author: Milton E. Anglin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Results from a kit lens
customer_reviews.text: This is a very impressive lens with some real time results as long as you take walk around photos in the light. Once darkness comes around, make sure that you have an tripod readily available because the shutter speed will drop....
customer_reviews.author: Rob's Photography Killeen TX

customer_reviews.title: My original kit lens went bad so purchased this as a replacement
customer_reviews.text: My original kit lens went bad so purchased this as a replacement. Actually takes better shots then the one the camera came with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lens but be careful 😵
customer_reviews.text: Great price , speedy delivery 😄This was to replace original kit lens. Make sure the camera power is off when pushing a lens hood on as it happened to me twice lens was extending out and I was trying to put good on . Second time original lens unusable 😜
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised it was a brand new lens and worked perfectly on my sony a6000
customer_reviews.author: Tony R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it works perfect and zoom works well.
customer_reviews.author: Cháidez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS LENS
customer_reviews.text: It COMPLETES my NEX-5R. I always have problem with NEX series since the stock lens just really bulky. This pancake lens works really great. It does drain battery faster though because the zoom motor.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Max

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because my first one broke. I took a few test pictures that came out nice.
customer_reviews.author: Paris lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good Value In a Lens
customer_reviews.text: These Sony lenses are a good value. While they will not get as good a rating from professional lens testing equipment, you will not see the difference when taking digital snapshots.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B. Fussell

customer_reviews.title: Fine fine lens
customer_reviews.text: After years of fiddling with Canon DSLRs for video, this lens was a huge relief. No more focus hunting (when paired with the a5100), no dreadful autofocus noise, no sticky zoom ring. I haven't had the need to upgrade to a better zoom lens.
customer_reviews.author: FG

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and handy.
customer_reviews.text: i got this lens because I wanted to have a short range zoom on the camera all the time, mainly for landscapes. It has turned my Sony NEX-7 into a high grade point and shoot that is always with me. It is a great lens and fun to use!

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lens. - Great quality - Packaging could be a lot better - 100% recommended

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered used like new. Arrived exactly as described and -works great. A perfect replacement for my broken Ken's.

customer_reviews.title: Good lens replacement
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little lens. I accidentally dropped my kit lens and broke it. This is a better lens to replace

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price

customer_reviews.title: Great Lens
customer_reviews.text: I broke the original lens to my camera and this one was a great replacement and a great price! No problems at all.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like the lens, ,but did not get rear cap, or sun shade or filter..

customer_reviews.title: Sony 16-50mm lens
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Sony A3000 and is very sharp. Focus ring has a little resistance but works ok. Power zoom works not really needed on 16-50mm range but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly just as described. Perfect for me who banged up the original lens and didn't want to pay full price for a new lens.
customer_reviews.author: Mario A. Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Before that though it's performance was good and optical quality fitting of the price
customer_reviews.text: Mine stopped working unexpectedly. Before that though it's performance was good and optical quality fitting of the price.

customer_reviews.title: Bad lans!
customer_reviews.text: I used this lens 5 times and it’s not working anymore. It says on display that lens is not recognized by camera.
customer_reviews.author: Milos

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with this lens for my NEX-6. Its not the best lens in the world optically but its very compact for a zoom and i was able to fit my camera in my jacket pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Juvx

customer_reviews.title: Back in business
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Seems to work perfectly and is exactly as described. I am happy to be able to use my camera again after jamming the original lens. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Better at 16mm than the pancake
customer_reviews.text: I compared the this lens at 16 mm to the Sony 16 mm pancake. This was sharper and had less magenta shift at the edges.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Snow

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: For what I payed and for the purpose of vlogging, this lens is compact, easy and not bad at all! Zoom speed was fine for me, I think some people are too picky.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: ... is small enough to carry around on the body like a point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Has become the workhorse for my close action photography and is small enough to carry around on the body like a point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great lens
customer_reviews.text: Works fine with nex-7 and i like to recommend it after firmware update the lens is sharp and perfect no regrets
customer_reviews.author: Per Backman

customer_reviews.title: It's very usable in daylight and great for Travel because of it focus range and retracted ...
customer_reviews.text: For me, this is just an mediocre lens that has limited usability. It's very usable in daylight and great for Travel because of it focus range and retracted form factor. Not so great in low light situations. I suppose the Power Zoom is good for video capabilities, but I don't find it any more convenient than Manual Zoom for photos. The other concern is reduction in battery life with the PZ. I'd rather use the SEL 18-55mm for it flexibility and in my opinion better optics.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I needed for my Sony alpha 6000.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Replacement lens for OEM NEX-3N
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for the original lens on my NEX-3N. My original lens was dropped and broke.
customer_reviews.author: E-Bear

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kit Lens
customer_reviews.text: Just got this lens from Electronics Basket. I haven't purchased an International-version lens before, but I figured the risk was worth it this time....the risk of a lens failing is usually small so the lack of a US warranty doesn't seem like a big deal, and this lens has a big price savings. Anyway, it arrived on time, well packaged and looks and performs just fine. It included both front and rear lens caps, plus a little bag and a cleaning cloth. While this isn't a high-end lens, it is a good kit lens, is small, and yields fine photos....all for a very low price. At such, it is a good kit lens, I think.
customer_reviews.author: TJ in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: This little lens is perfect for the Sony a 6000

customer_reviews.title: Nice lens.  Works great with my NEX 7

customer_reviews.title: The lens produces beautiful pictures. However
customer_reviews.text: The lens produces beautiful pictures. However, this is our second in a bit more than one year. They are far too delicate.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Just received the item. It has a big label ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received the item. It has a big label on the box saying that it is an international version. It was advertised as "retail box" version and the price is even higher than others on Amazon which are advertised as international version. I'm returning it right away. If I wanted an international version, I would have selected one of those.

customer_reviews.title: Great refurbished lens!
customer_reviews.text: This refurbished lens was much less expensive than new and performed flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my original pancake
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT... DO NOT.... DO NOT... drop your pancake lens. I have a NEX-6 which I love and accidentally dropped it maybe 4 feet moving things around. I usually wrap the neck strap around my hands to make sure everything is secure but I guess I did not do it this time or not good enough. Anyway, ever since that mishap my original lens was giving me trouble. Sometime the camera would say the lens was unrecognizable. Other times the lens would not open at all. Eventually while out in Little Italy and SOHO shooting scenes it finally fully stopped working on me. Forcing me to replace it

customer_reviews.title: good lens

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact lens
customer_reviews.text: This a fine lens. It's silent with the zoom and focusing and very compact. I use it to shoot video on my A6300 and it works like a charm. Since this is an APS-c lens for APS-C cameras, I would have liked it slightly wider but at this price range I knew I was making a compromise, it's not a deal breaker but it's one of those little things that bugs you from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: PeteTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lens is okay, but I was shocked that that it was shipped without the back lens cover.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Donahey

customer_reviews.title: It looks like used. Also I didn't received Sony Lens cap
customer_reviews.text: Lens has dust and scratch. It looks like used. Also I didn't received Sony Lens cap, replacement rear cap, and Free gift(lens cap holder)
customer_reviews.author: Chul Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: My original kit lens broke, looking for a replacement and this works just fine. I looked everywhere online with the lens price averaging $200-$300. This was the cheapest I found even with an additional 3-year warranty from Amazon. It came with lens cap/cover on both ends. I don't know the difference between the international version vs US version. I'm not a serious photographer so I'm just happy that it works to take family shots.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Lens works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: The phrase "bulk packaging" sounds worrisome, but in my case, I received a perfectly good lens that looked brand new. The original lens that came with my NEX-6 failed after I dropped it. This replacement has worked perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lens, original Sony from Japan
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lens, original Sony from Japan. Photos are excellent, especially with my Sony a6000. Best 50mm and under, Sony lens I have. Zoom and function is awesomely unexpected, not conventional. Excellently amazing.

After opening his present yesterday, he noticed the lens cover was missing as well as the dust cap for the camera end. I received the lens in a box, with no bubble wrap or protection of any kind. The lens works fine, but missing parts.

customer_reviews.text: This lens IS NOT COMPATIBLE with Sony cameras. When I try to use my camera, an error message appears on the screen and the camera freezes up. I cannot take photos.
customer_reviews.author: Connie G

product_meta.title: Sony SELP1650 16-50mm Power Zoom Lens
product_meta.description:
Compact and lightweight design for excellent portability thanks to retract-ability down to a mere 29.9 mm

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



E PZ 16-50MM F3.5-5.6 OSS POWER ZOOM LENS
This 16-50mm retractable zoom lens is super compact and easy to carry and the ideal lens for traveling and other scenarios that require a lightweight, compact camera and lens combo.

TECHNOLOGY
CIRCULAR APERTURE
When changing your aperture to defocus the background, the light sources appear blurred. This ‘bokeh’ effect of the blurred background can be enhanced with circular aperture blades used in this lens. Conventional aperture blades have flat sides creating unappealing polygonal shaped defocussed points of light. α lenses overcome this problem through a unique design that keeps the aperture almost perfectly circular from its wide-open setting to when it is closed by 2 stops. Smoother, more natural defocusing can be obtained as a result.

ED (EXTRA-LOW DISPERSION) GLASS
As focal lengths get longer, lenses built with conventional optical glass have difficulties with chromatic aberration, and as a result images suffer from lower contrast, lower color quality, and lower resolution. ED glass dramatically reduces chromatic aberration at telephoto ranges, and provides superior contrast across the entire image, even at large aperture settings. Super ED glass provides enhanced compensation for chromatic aberration.

ASPHERICAL LENS ELEMENTS
Aspherical lens design dramatically reduces spherical aberration while also reducing lens size and weight. Spherical aberration is a slight misalignment of the light rays projected on the image plane. This is caused by differences in refraction at different points on conventional spherical lenses which degrade image quality in large-aperture lenses. Specially shaped “aspherical” elements near the diaphragm restore alignment of light rays at the image plane, maintaining high sharpness and contrast even at maximum aperture and can also be used at other points in the optical path to reduce distortion. Well-designed aspherical elements can reduce the total number of elements required in the lens, thus reducing overall size and weight. Advanced Aspherical (AA) elements are an evolved variant, featuring an extremely high thickness ratio between the center and periphery. AA elements are exceedingly difficult to produce, relying on the most advanced molding technology to consistently and precisely achieve the required shape and surface accuracy, resulting in significantly improved image accuracy and quality.

DISTANCE ENCODER
The distance encoder plays an integral part in ADI flash metering, which delivers high precision flash metering that is unaffected by the reflectance of subjects or backgrounds. The distance encoder is a lens component that directly detects the position of the focusing mechanism, and sends a signal to the CPU in order to measure distance to the subject. During flash photography, this data is very useful in calculating how much flash output is appropriate to the scene.

LENS-BASED OPTICAL IMAGE STABILIZATION
Gyro sensors built into the lens detect even the slightest movement, and the stabilization lens is precisely shifted to counteract any image blur that might occur. The use of precision, quiet linear motors and technology inherited from high-end Sony professional camcorders results in exceptionally quiet, effective image stabilization that contributes to high-quality movies as well as stills.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
INTERNAL FOCUSING
Only the middle groups of the optical system move to achieve focus, so the overall length of the lens does not change. Other important benefits include fast autofocusing and a short minimum focusing distance. Also, the filter thread at the front of the lens does not rotate, which is convenient if you’re using a polarizing filter.

SELP1650 not recommended for use with NEX-3, NEX-5, NEX-C3
